# Unity generated files and folders to ignore

# OS-specific
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Build files
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Bb]in/
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/

# User-specific settings
UserSettings/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# Crash reports
sysinfo.txt

# Unity auto-generated files
*.apk
*.idb
*.log

# Audio streaming assets
StreamingAssets/

# Addressable Assets Data
[Aa]ssets/[Aa]ddressableAssetsData/

# Local cache files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.iml
*.log

# Package caches
# These should be ignored unless you want to commit your lock file
Packages/manifest.json
Packages/packages-lock.json
